alert.note: Alert for Bee; Goliad; Live Oak; McMullen; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 03 at 3:17AM CST until February 04 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 6 AM CST FRIDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO NOON CST FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 13 degrees. For the Winter Weather Advisory, light freezing rain and sleet expected. Total ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...McMullen, Live Oak, Bee, Goliad and Victoria Counties. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from midnight tonight to noon CST Friday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 3 PM this afternoon to 6 AM CST Friday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The dangerously cold wind chills could result in hypothermia or frostbite if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible power outages. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Bee; Goliad; Live Oak; McMullen; Victoria
